alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:01AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Jackson, Madison, eastern Lauderdale, Limestone, east central Colbert, northern Morgan, northern Lawrence and south central Lincoln Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 600 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Market to near Athens to near Underwood-Petersville. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Decatur, Madison, Florence, Athens, Muscle Shoals, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Redstone Arsenal and Hazel Green. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
